Items.Title: Oversight - Resources Available to Protect the City’s Immigrants from Deportation.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Resources Available to Protect the City’s Immigrants from Deportation.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York State Governor Andrew Cuomo to continue and expand the Immigrant Pardon Panel to ensure that legal permanent residents who paid their debts to, and are now productive members of, society can continue to contribute to our great State.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Governor-Elect Andrew Cuomo to continue and expand the Immigrant Pardon Board.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to extend the Temporary Protected Status designation of Haiti and eligible Haitians, which is now set to expire on July 22, 2011.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling upon the Secretary of the Dept of Homeland Security to extend the Temporary Protected Status designation of Haiti and eligible Haitians, which is now set to expire on July 22, 2011.
